[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-datasource-protocol](./harp-datasource-protocol.md) &gt; [ITiler](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiler.md)

## ITiler interface

General type tiler which can be used to provide tile untiled payloads.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ITiler 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [connect()](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiler.connect.md) | Connect to tiler.<!-- -->Should be implemented by implementations that use special resources that decode jobs like WebWorkers. |
|  [dispose()](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiler.dispose.md) | Free all resources associated with this tiler.<!-- -->Called by users when decoder is no longer used and all resources must be freed. |
|  [getTile(indexId, tileKey)](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiler.gettile.md) | Retrieves a tile for a previously registered index. |
|  [registerIndex(indexId, indexUrl)](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiler.registerindex.md) | Register index in the tiler. Indexes registered in the tiler can be later used to retrieved tiled payloads using <code>getTile</code>. |
|  [updateIndex(indexId, indexUrl)](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiler.updateindex.md) | Update index in the tiler. Indexes registered in the tiler can be later used to retrieved tiled payloads using <code>getTile</code>. |
